text: hey folks, i know recursion can be tricky so i’m planning on devoting the first 15 minutes of office hours to a group review of the concepts from lab. if you’re really having trouble with that aspect, please try to be there at the start (it’s ok if you want this but can’t make it right at the beginning, of course, but hit me on the side if this is the case). will spend the rest of the time doing normal office hours

also, just to get a sense of numbers, i’d appreciate if you’d vote blue on the above post if you’re planning on coming to group, and red if you’re planning on coming to office hours for other purposes. and feel free to hit me on the side if you’d like to do either but don’t want to sign your name to it
(and its definitely ok if you dont vote or @ me and want to come to either)
<@U1HAU35L1>  and what will you cover in the lecture on Tuesday?

<@U1UKGET0A> <@U1Z9AU3EG> a quick clarification, apart from the lab on wednesday, every week we have TA office hours on thursday 10:30 -11:30  and mondays 5:30-6:30 in the colab
these sessions are explicitly for helping with the homeworks or for any general questions around 206
Typically me and <@U1HAU35L1> will alternately take the complete ownerships for the assignments
meaning for that assignment, the lab and the office hours of the following thursday & monday would be taken by the same TA
